Text: RE Formosa Millionam told that this money should come this week Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Tuesday May AM To Colwell Wes Subject FW Formosa Million This is bizzare Global Markets promised Jean this money and wont seem to write her a check It was also a low number relative to what was created for GM John Original Message From Gossett Jeffrey C Sent Tuesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Mrha Jean Subject Formosa Million John Global Markets is maintaining that there are accounting issues with the million Should we get Faith Killen or Wes to get this wrapped up

RE Q GainsLosses Cc Original Message From Miller Michael L Sent Wednesday May AM To Colwell Wes Kettler Kyle Subject RE Q GainsLosses Sounds like a plan The only potential obstacle would be if timing completion of latest funding round necessitates recognition of gainloss in Q At this juncture this does not appear likely but could still happen Well keep you posted MLM Original Message From Colwell Wes Sent May To Kettler Kyle Cc Miller Michael L Subject RE Q GainsLosses Talked to Lavorato He would like to write down Syntroleum but wait and see what the fundings bring for Dais and EnCorp That probably makes the most sense for me on the earnings front and provides some certainty to the valuations of those two Call me if you have questions Thanks Wes Original Message From Kettler Kyle Sent Friday May PM To Colwell Wes Cc Miller Michael L Subject Q GainsLosses Wes Per your request Q gains are as follows Dais Analytic EnCorp MTC Metering Utiliquest RASH gross net to ENA Q we took no gains but we did write down Utiliquest per a RASH by gross net to ENA Please call if you have any questions x Regards Kyle Kettler

FW MOU Cc ALL DUE RESPECT TO YOU there is a reason we make the comments we make and if you have a couple of hours I will be happy sit down and explain to you the lease accounting rules In this particular matter we are attempting to deal with an on vs off balance sheet issue I realize that your commercial issues dont always work with the accounting but in that case I would hope you would simply communicate that fact and then we could jointly decide whether we should finance this deal on balance sheet or not given the size of opportunity you have By the way have you involved Joe Deffner or Brian Kerrigan from ENA Treasury Wes Original Message From Farmer Stanley Sent Wednesday May AM To Colwell Wes Subject FW MOU Per your request Original Message From Sole Carlos Sent Thursday May AM To Duffy Matthew Cc Fleenor William Farmer Stanley Manis Herman Subject Re MOU Matthew with all due respect clients will be doing business with Enron as it is indentified in the introductory paragraph and the signature block Indeed as a side note most of the documents that I have drafted or reviewed always use some form of acronym for subsequent references to Enron I am indifferent but I know that the reason our accounting brethen made that comment as well as the other comments they often make that seem counterintuitive is that it facilitates their efforts in ensuring that documents reflect offbalance sheet soft costs related rather than onbalance sheet hard costs As such I would defer to them on this issue Forwarded by Carlos SoleNAEnron on AM Matthew Duffy AM To Carlos nron cc Subject Re MOU Carlos with all due respect to our Accounting brethren from a commercial point of view potential clients dont want to do business with EDM they want to do business with Enron So please switch the EDM thing back to Enron and everything will be fine If you can initial next to Maxs name to let him know youve given your approval and FAX the signature page we can take it from there Thanks Matt Matthew Duffy Enron de Mexico Phone From the US Inside Mexico Carlos Sole PM To Matthew nron cc Subject MOU Attached is a revised version of the MOU The most susbtantive were the addition of a couple of new sentences in section Also one of the comments that I got from accounting was that they prefer not to have references to Enron but an acronym instead Otherwise its fine Carlos Sole Senior Counsel Enron North America Corp Smith Street Houston Texas phone fax Embedded StdOleLink

FW April Assets Cc Hope youre doing well and getting some sleep John asked me to send you an email concerning the move of Dick Lydecker under the Wholesale investing effort headed by Kevin Garland I have attached the April assets listing for your reference It was Johns sense that he would want to place certain assets under Dick which arent currently his such as AIG and maybe even Bridgeline We should probably make some cut that could be different than the existing owners Other Investments of note Onondaga All of Mike Millers stuff I assume including Destec Some of Redmonds retained assets see p East Coast Power loan mm All of the CLO Investments These would all be candidates to move some of which might land with Dick anyway I think John just wanted you thinking about this Call me if you have thoughts or need further info By the way I scanned other BS accounts and nothing exists there which should be moved Wes Original Message From Vargas Hope Sent Friday June AM To Colwell Wes Subject April Assets Please refer to the Contact tab
